Package it.polimi.se2019.limperio.nicotera.italia.events.events_by_server

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    KillshotTrackEvent
    Event for update state of remote view of a player about the creation or update of killshot track.
    MapEvent
    Event for update the state of map view in the remote view of a player.
    PlayerBoardEvent
    Event for update of the player board view in the remote view of the players.
    RequestActionEvent
    Event to request to a player to choose an action to do showing what he can really do.
    RequestChooseActionForTerminator
    Event that handles the request to a player to choose an action that terminator has to do.
    RequestForChooseAWeaponToCatch
    Event to request to choose a weapon to catch
    RequestInitializationEvent
    Event to ask to player information for his initialization like nickname, color and, if he is the first player if he wants to play with frenzy mode at the end of normal game, if he wants to play in terminator mode in the case the game stars with only three players, and which type of map he wants to play with.
    RequestSelectionSquareForAction
    Event generated to request to a player to choose a square to complete an action.
    RequestSelectionWeaponToReload
    Event to request to player the weapon card he wants to use to reload.
    RequestToChooseAnEffect
    Event generated to request to player to choose an effect of the weapon chosen to shoot.
    RequestToChooseAPlayer
    Event to request to player to choose a player.
    RequestToChooseMultiplePlayers
    Event to request to player to choose multiple players for one of his attack.
    RequestToChooseWeapon
    Event to request to player to choose one weapon after that he decided to shoot.
    RequestToDiscardPowerUpCard
    Event to request to player to discard a power up card.
    RequestToDiscardWeaponCard
    Event to request to discard a weapon card when player wants to catch another one but has already the deck full.
    RequestToPayWithAmmoOrPUCard
    Event to request to player with what he wants to pay the price for targeting scope.
    RequestToSelectionPlayerToAttackWithTerminator
    Event to request to choose a player that terminator has to attack.
    ServerEvent
    Event generated by some components located in server side.
    ServerEvent.AliasCard
    Represents a simplified structure to encapsulate the main attributes of cards (Weapon and PowerUp) to send them to clients removing from them the possibility to use directly their effects.
